 class ShaderFilm
          Film grain & scanlines shader Based on three.js code
Ported from HLSL to WebGL / GLSL truevision3d.com Screen Space Static Postprocessor Produces an analogue noise overlay similar to a film grain / TV static Original implementation and noise algorithm Pat 'Hawthorne' Shearon
Optimized scanlines + noise version with intensity scaling Georg 'Leviathan' Steinrohder

 class ShaderHorizontalBlur
          Two pass Gaussian blur filter (horizontal and vertical blur shaders) described in gamerendering.com and used in www.cake23.de.
 class ShaderHorizontalTiltShift
          Simple fake tilt-shift effect, modulating two pass Gaussian blur (see above) by vertical position Based on three.js code 9 samples per pass
standard deviation 2.7
"h" and "v" parameters should be set to "1 / width" and "1 / height"
"r" parameter control where "focused" horizontal line lies
 class ShaderLuminosity
          Luminosity
 class ShaderNormalmap
          Normal map shader Based on three.js code compute normals from heightmap
 class ShaderRriangleBlur
          Triangle blur shader Based on three.js code
Based on glfx.js triangle blur shader github.com/evanw/glfx.js A basic blur filter, which convolves the image with a pyramid filter.
 class ShaderScreen

 class ShaderSsao
